metadata.title: CVE-2018-20002 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The _bfd_generic_read_minisymbols function in syms.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31,has a memory leak via a crafted ELF file, leading to a denial of service(memory consumption), as demonstrated by nm.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
